name: YouTube Pristine 2.0
description: A clean, fresh new look for your YouTube space.  Modifying all pages, this skin gives YouTube an organized desk appearance, complete with flashcards and post-its.
additional_info:
Version 2.0:
==============
- Adds new customization options
- Modifies all pages under YouTube Domain
- Functional on Windows 8.1 OS and Windows 10
- Functional with Chrome Web Browser
- Some known issues with Chromebook (generally will work after enable/disable and some wait time)
- Some screenshots include YouTube player re-sizing from YouTube Center: https://github.com/YePpHa/YouTubeCenter/wiki

style_setting_options.label: slim
style_setting_options.value:
#watch7-sidebar { margin-right: -15px; }
.player-api { background: none !important; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.5); border: 7.5px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, .5); margin-left: -15px; }

style_setting_options.label: thick
style_setting_options.value:
#watch7-sidebar { margin-right: -30px; }
.player-api { background: none !important; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.5); border: 15px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, .5); margin-left: -30px; }

style_setting_options.label: slate grey
